greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of partitions of n modulo 5.
comment: Of the partitions of numbers from 1 to 100000: 36256 are 0, 15758 are 1, 16133 are 2, 16028 are 3 and 15825 are 4 modulo 5, largely because the number of partitions of 5m+4 is always a multiple of 5.
link: Henry Bottomley, Partition calculators using java applets
Index entries for sequences related to partitions
formula: a(n) = Pm(n,1) with Pm(n,k) = if k<n then (Pm(n-k,k) + Pm(n,k+1)) mod 5 else 0^(n*(k-n)). [From _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 09 2009]
results.author: _Henry Bottomley_, Mar 05 2002
